org.fcrepo.common

Class Models

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.fcrepo.common.Models

  • public abstract class Models
extends Object
    Identities of the system content models.
    Author:
    Aaron Birkland, Chris Wilper

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static RDFName CONTENT_MODEL_3_0
      The content model for Content Model objects as of Fedora 3.0; info:fedora/fedora-system:ContentModel-3.0

      The basic content model for Fedora objects as of Fedora 3.0; info:fedora/fedora-system:FedoraObject-3.0

      The basic content model for Fedora objects as the current release; info:fedora/fedora-system:FedoraObject-3.0

      The content model for Service Definition objects as of Fedora 3.0; info:fedora/fedora-system:ServiceDefinition-3.0

    • Method Detail

      • contains

        public static boolean contains(String model)
        Determine if any of the models defined herein match the given model uri.
        Parameters:
        model - URI of a content model;
        Returns:
        true if the uri of one of the models matches the given uri.

      • isBasicModel

        public static boolean isBasicModel(String model)
        Determine if the given model URI is a basic content model (current or otherwise).
        Parameters:
        model - URI of a content model;
        Returns:
        true if the given model URI denotes a basic content model.
